item.content:encoded: Matthew Woods deserves support as much as airport tweeter Paul Chambers | Charlie Skelton: Woods's jokes about A... http://t.co/EeSjrZJ6 Charlie Skelton: Woods's jokes about April Jones may have been offensive – and frankly baffling – but the mob logic behind his jailing is scary Link - Trackbacks

item.title: Liberal media split over how to spin Raddatz and Biden's performance at debate
item.description: Liberal media split over how to spin Raddatz and Biden's performance at debate: The 2012 vice presidential debat... http://t.co/yKXJeXWi
item.content:encoded: Liberal media split over how to spin Raddatz and Biden's performance at debate: The 2012 vice presidential debat... http://t.co/yKXJeXWi The 2012 vice presidential debate was sometimes a 2-on-1 fight, with Biden and moderator Martha Raddatz both interrupting Republican vice presidential nominee Paul Ryan repeatedly. item.title: Virginia Poll: Romney Leads By 7
item.description: Virginia Poll: Romney Leads By 7 http://t.co/wydNk2Jz via @BreitbartNews
item.content:encoded: Virginia Poll: Romney Leads By 7 http://t.co/wydNk2Jz via @BreitbartNews If these numbers hold for Romney, Romney could be free to expand the electoral map and more aggressively make plays for states like Michigan and Pennsylvania that were considered "reaches" just two weeks ago. Link - Trackbacks
